result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Emmanuel Arthur Reyes

records.addlTxt: Defendant's Notice of Motion for Modification of Bail Conditions, filed.

Defendant Emmanuel Arthur Reyes not in court, in custody.  Attorney Joel Alan Mogren Aty in court for Emmanuel Arthur Reyes.  Prosecuting attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense is requesting a Motion to Suppress hearing date.  Jury trial scheduled for 10-17-22 at 8:30 am is vacated.  Case is adjourned to 11-9-22 at 2:30 pm for a Motion to Suppress in person in Room 504 of the Courthouse.
Motion hearing scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Attorney Joel Alan Mogren in court, defendant Emmanuel Arthur Reyes not in court, in custody.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a plea and sentencing.  Defense is requesting a final pretrial and jury trial dates.  Case is adjourned to 9-12-22 at 1:30 pm for final pretrial and 10-17-22 at 8:30 am for jury trial.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Joel Alan Mogren in court, defendant Emmanuel Arthur Reyes not in court, in custody.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/LIVE ON DACAST.  Case in court for status conference.  Defense requests a plea/sentencing date.  Court set date as requested.  Matter will be heard in person in room 504 of the Courthouse.  Case adjourned to Branch 10.
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 2, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Attorney Joel Alan Mogren in court, defendant Emmanuel Arthur Reyes not in court, in custody.  Ryan Jay Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Mogren was just appointed to the case.  Defense needs discovery and an offer. Case is adjourned to 7-18-22 at 8:30 am for status conference, by zoom.
  This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Status conference scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.  The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  Defendant to be monitored by drug testing.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Court ordered no contact with Lakesha S.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Defendant Emmanuel Arthur Reyes in court with attorney Michael J Cerniglia.  Defendant Emmanuel Arthur Reyes in custody.  Annie Louk appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Emmanuel Arthur Reyes appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
